titleInfo.title: Martha White Flour Company Job No. 37026

mods.abstract: Invoice (No. 1572) for an order placed by the Martha White Flour Company for 150 two color window cards for a performance by Earl Scruggs and Lester Flatt at the Air Way Theatre on July 8 and 100 two color window cards for a performance by Earl Scruggs and Lester Flatt at the Forest City Community House on July 9. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
